long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sensei AI is an interview copilot that does your interviews in real time. Use this chrome extension in addition to our main app to solve any technical problems in your way.

Real-Time AI Assistance:
Get instant support during your coding interviews with real-time suggestions, hints, and solutions tailored to the problem at hand.

Multi-Language Support:
Our extension seamlessly supports all major programming languages, ensuring you're never left without the tools you need, regardless of the language required by the interviewer.

Platform Compatibility:
Whether you're using LeetCode, HackerRank, CodeSignal, or any other major coding platform, our extension integrates smoothly to provide uninterrupted assistance.

Interactive Code Explanations:
Get step-by-step explanations for complex algorithms and coding problems, making it easier to understand and explain your solutions during the interview.

Enhanced User Interface:
Enjoy a sleek, user-friendly, and hands-off interface that integrates seamlessly with your coding environment, ensuring you can focus on what matters—acing your interview.
